org.bremersee.utils

Class CodingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bremersee.utils.CodingUtils

  • public abstract class CodingUtils
extends Object

    Some coding utilities for generating hashes, encoding and decoding.

    Author:
    Christian Bremer

      • getInstanceSilently

        public static MessageDigest getInstanceSilently(String algorithm)
        Returns a MessageDigest object that implements the specified digest algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the name of the algorithm requested
        Returns:
        a MessageDigest object that implements the specified algorithm
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if a MessageDigestSpi implementation for the specified algorithm is not available

      • getInstanceSilently

        public static MessageDigest getInstanceSilently(String algorithm,
                                                String provider)
        Returns a MessageDigest object that implements the specified digest algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the name of the algorithm requested
        provider - the provider (may be null)
        Returns:
        a MessageDigest object that implements the specified algorithm
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if a MessageDigestSpi implementation for the specified algorithm is not available from the specified Provider object

        Parameters:

        bytes - a byte array
        Returns:

                                   InputStream inputStream,
                                   boolean closeInputStream)
        Calculates a hash value.
        Parameters:
        md - the MessageDigest
        inputStream - an input stream
        closeInputStream - if true the input stream will be closed, otherwise it will stay open
        Returns:
        the array of bytes for the hash value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if message digest or input stream are null
        RuntimeException - if calculation of the hash fails

      • toBytesSilently

        public static byte[] toBytesSilently(String text,
                                     String charsetName)
        Encodes the specified string into a sequence of bytes using the named charset, storing the result into a new byte array.
        Parameters:
        text - the string
        charsetName - the charset name
        Returns:
        the resultant byte array
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the text is null
        RuntimeException - if the named charset is not supported

      • toStringSilently

        public static String toStringSilently(byte[] bytes,
                                      String charsetName)
        Constructs a new String by decoding the specified array of bytes using the specified charset.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the bytes
        charsetName - the name of the charset
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if bytes are null
        RuntimeException - if the named charset is not supported
